20101207190712.250|20101207190713.500|CCO|WHEN PEOPLE GET UNEMPLOYMENT 
20101207190713.500|20101207190714.750|CCO|INSURANCE, MORE OF THAT MONEY 
20101207190714.750|20101207190716.000|CCO|GOES RIGHT BACK INTO THE ECONOMY
20101207190716.000|20101207190717.250|CCO|THAN MIGHT HAPPEN IF YOU HAVE 
20101207190717.250|20101207190718.500|CCO|GIVE IT TO SOMEBODY WITH A LOT

20101207190719.750|20101207190721.000|CCO|IT.
20101207190721.000|20101207190722.667|CCO|SOMEONE ON UNEMPLOYMENT 
20101207190722.667|20101207190724.333|CCO|INSURANCE GENERALLY CAN'T CHOOSE

20101207190727.667|20101207190729.333|CCO|US A VERY MOVING STORY AN HOUR 
20101207190729.333|20101207190731.000|CCO|AGO ABOUT ONE OF THE 99'ers,

20101207191103.000|20101207191105.000|CCO|>> I THINK THE AMERICAN PEOPLE

20101207191414.750|20101207191416.000|CCO|HE'S MADE WITH REPUBLICANS.

20101207191418.500|20101207191419.750|CCO|QUESTIONS.
20101207191419.750|20101207191421.000|CCO|AND SOME OF THOSE QUESTIONS MAY 
20101207191421.000|20101207191423.000|CCO|FOCUS ON THE FACT THAT THERE ARE
20101207191423.000|20101207191425.000|CCO|SOME DEMOCRATS, PARTICULARLY

20101207191429.000|20101207191431.000|CCO|DEAL TO EXTEND THE BUSH-ERA TAX

20101207191432.667|20101207191434.333|CCO|MIDDLE CLASS.
20101207191434.333|20101207191436.000|CCO|BUT TO HOUSEHOLDS EARNING MORE 
20101207191436.000|20101207191437.667|CCO|THAN $250,000.

20101207192749.000|20101207192751.000|CCO|AGREEMENT, WE WILL CUT PAYROLL 
20101207192751.000|20101207192753.000|CCO|TAXES IN 2011, WHICH WILL ADD

20101207192755.000|20101207192757.000|CCO|PAY OF A TYPICAL FAMILY.

20101207192801.000|20101207192803.000|CCO|THIS IS REAL MONEY FOR REAL 
20101207192803.000|20101207192805.000|CCO|PEOPLE THAT WILL MAKE A REAL 
20101207192805.000|20101207192807.000|CCO|DIFFERENCE IN THE LIVES OF THE 
20101207192807.000|20101207192809.000|CCO|FOLKS WHO SENT US HERE.
20101207192809.000|20101207192811.000|CCO|IT WILL MAKE A REAL DIFFERENCE 
20101207192811.000|20101207192812.667|CCO|IN THE PACE OF JOB CREATION AND 
20101207192812.667|20101207192814.333|CCO|ECONOMIC GROWTH.
20101207192814.333|20101207192816.000|CCO|IN OTHER WORDS, IT'S A GOOD DEAL

20101207192817.667|20101207192819.333|CCO|NOW, I KNOW THERE ARE SOME WHO

20101207193521.000|20101207193522.429|CCO|FEDERAL RESERVE DID WHEREBY

20101207193528.143|20101207193529.571|CCO|WHERE THE ECONOMY ALTHOUGH 
20101207193529.571|20101207193531.000|CCO|GROWING, ALTHOUGH COMPANY 
20101207193531.000|20101207193533.000|CCO|PROFITS UP, ALTHOUGH WE ARE 
20101207193533.000|20101207193535.000|CCO|SEEING SOME JOB GROWTH IN THE 
20101207193535.000|20101207193537.000|CCO|PRIVATE SECTOR, THE ECONOMY IS 
20101207193537.000|20101207193539.000|CCO|NOT GROWING FAST ENOUGH TO DRIVE
20101207193539.000|20101207193541.000|CCO|DOWN THE UNEMPLOYMENT RATE GIVEN
20101207193541.000|20101207193543.000|CCO|THE 8 MILLION JOBS THAT WERE 
20101207193543.000|20101207193545.000|CCO|LOST BEFORE I CAME INTO OFFICE 
20101207193545.000|20101207193547.000|CCO|AND JUST AS I WAS COMING INTO 
20101207193547.000|20101207193549.000|CCO|OFFICE.
20101207193549.000|20101207193551.000|CCO|SO WHAT THIS PACKAGE DOES IS 
20101207193551.000|20101207193552.667|CCO|PROVIDE AN ADDITIONAL BOOST THAT
20101207193552.667|20101207193554.333|CCO|IS SUBSTANTIALLY MORE 
20101207193554.333|20101207193556.000|CCO|SIGNIFICANT THAN I THINK MOST 
20101207193556.000|20101207193557.667|CCO|ECONOMIC FORECASTERS HAD 
20101207193557.667|20101207193559.333|CCO|EXPECTED.
20101207193559.333|20101207193601.000|CCO|AND IN FACT, YOU'VE ALREADY SEEN
20101207193601.000|20101207193603.500|CCO|SOME JUST OVER THE LAST 24 HOURS
20101207193603.500|20101207193606.000|CCO|SUGGEST THAT WE MAY SEE FASTER 
20101207193606.000|20101207193608.500|CCO|GROWTH AND MORE JOB GROWTH AS A 
20101207193608.500|20101207193611.000|CCO|CONSEQUENCE OF THIS PACKAGE.
20101207193611.000|20101207193612.667|CCO|I THINK THE PAYROLL TAX HOLIDAY 
20101207193612.667|20101207193614.333|CCO|WILL HAVE AN IMPACT.
20101207193614.333|20101207193616.000|CCO|UNEMPLOYMENT INSURANCE PROBABLY 
20101207193616.000|20101207193617.667|CCO|HAS THE BIGGEST IMPACT IN TERMS 
20101207193617.667|20101207193619.333|CCO|OF MAKING SURE THAT THE RECOVERY
20101207193619.333|20101207193621.000|CCO|THAT WE HAVE CONTINUES AND 
20101207193621.000|20101207193624.333|CCO|PERHAPS AT A FASTER PACE.
20101207193624.333|20101207193627.667|CCO|SO OVERALL, EVERY ECONOMIST I'VE
20101207193627.667|20101207193631.000|CCO|TALKED TO SUGGESTS THAT THIS 
20101207193631.000|20101207193633.000|CCO|WILL HELP ECONOMIC GROWTH AND 
20101207193633.000|20101207193635.000|CCO|THIS WILL HELP JOB GROWTH OVER 
20101207193635.000|20101207193637.000|CCO|THE NEXT SEVERAL MONTHS.
20101207193637.000|20101207193639.000|CCO|AND THAT IS THE MAIN CRITERIA BY
20101207193639.000|20101207193641.000|CCO|WHICH I MADE THIS DECISION.
20101207193641.000|20101207193643.000|CCO|LOOK, THIS IS SOMETHING THAT I 
20101207193643.000|20101207193645.000|CCO|THINK EVERYBODY HAS TO REMEMBER.
20101207193645.000|20101207193647.000|CCO|AND I WOULD SPEAK ESPECIALLY TO 
20101207193647.000|20101207193649.000|CCO|MY FELLOW DEMOCRATS WHO I THINK 
20101207193649.000|20101207193651.000|CCO|RIGHTLY ARE PASSIONATE ABOUT 
20101207193651.000|20101207193652.667|CCO|MIDDLE CLASS FAMILIES, WORKING 
20101207193652.667|20101207193654.333|CCO|FAMILIES, LOW INCOME FAMILIES 
20101207193654.333|20101207193656.000|CCO|WHO ARE HAVING THE TOUGHEST TIME
20101207193656.000|20101207193657.667|CCO|IN THIS ECONOMY.
20101207193657.667|20101207193659.333|CCO|THE SINGLE MOST IMPORTANT JOBS 
20101207193659.333|20101207193701.000|CCO|PROGRAM WE CAN PUT IN PLACE IS A
20101207193701.000|20101207193702.250|CCO|GROWING ECONOMY.
20101207193702.250|20101207193703.500|CCO|THE SINGLE MOST IMPORTANT 
20101207193703.500|20101207193704.750|CCO|ANTI-POVERTY PROGRAM WE CAN PUT 
20101207193704.750|20101207193706.000|CCO|IN PLACE IS MAKING SURE FOLKS 
20101207193706.000|20101207193707.250|CCO|HAVE JOBS AND THE ECONOMY IS 
20101207193707.250|20101207193708.500|CCO|GROWING.
20101207193708.500|20101207193709.750|CCO|WE CAN DO A WHOLE BUNCH OF OTHER
20101207193709.750|20101207193711.000|CCO|STUFF.
20101207193711.000|20101207193712.667|CCO|BUT IF THE ECONOMY IS NOT 
20101207193712.667|20101207193714.333|CCO|GROWING, IF THE PRIVATE SECTOR 
20101207193714.333|20101207193716.000|CCO|IS NOT HIRING FASTER THAN IT'S 
20101207193716.000|20101207193717.667|CCO|CURRENTLY HIRING, THEN WE ARE 
20101207193717.667|20101207193719.333|CCO|GOING TO CONTINUE TO HAVE

20101207193726.000|20101207193728.500|CCO|WHAT OUR OPTIONS WERE, FOR US TO

20101207193739.000|20101207193741.000|CCO|WOULD THAT HAVE A DIRECT IMPACT 
20101207193741.000|20101207193743.500|CCO|ON PEOPLE WHO ARE UNEMPLOYED AND

20101207193746.000|20101207193748.500|CCO|INSURANCE TO PAY THE BILLS OR 
20101207193748.500|20101207193751.000|CCO|KEEP THEIR HOME OR KEEP THEIR 
20101207193751.000|20101207193752.429|CCO|CAR, BUT IN TERMS OF 
20101207193752.429|20101207193753.857|CCO|MACROECONOMICS, THE OVERALL 
20101207193753.857|20101207193755.286|CCO|HEALTH OF THE ECONOMY, THAT 
20101207193755.286|20101207193756.714|CCO|WOULD HAVE BEEN A DAMAGING 
20101207193756.714|20101207193758.143|CCO|THING.
20101207193758.143|20101207193759.571|CCO|>> JUST TO FOLLOW UP.
20101207193759.571|20101207193801.000|CCO|THE UNEMPLOYMENT RATE WAS JUST 
20101207193801.000|20101207193802.429|CCO|NORTH OF 8% WHEN THE LAST 
20101207193802.429|20101207193803.857|CCO|RECOVERY ACT WAS PUT IN PLACE.
20101207193803.857|20101207193805.286|CCO|IT'S NOW 9.8%.
20101207193805.286|20101207193806.714|CCO|ARE YOU PREPARED TO SAY TODAY

20101207193808.143|20101207193809.571|CCO|GOING TO GO DOWN AS A RESULT OF

20101207193812.667|20101207193814.333|CCO|UNEMPLOYMENT RATE IS GOING TO BE
20101207193814.333|20101207193816.000|CCO|GOING DOWN BECAUSE THE ECONOMY 
20101207193816.000|20101207193817.667|CCO|IS GROWING.
20101207193817.667|20101207193819.333|CCO|AND EVEN THOUGH IT'S GROWING 
20101207193819.333|20101207193821.000|CCO|MORE SLOWLY THAN I'D LIKE, IT'S 
20101207193821.000|20101207193823.500|CCO|STILL GROWING.
20101207193823.500|20101207193826.000|CCO|NOW, HOW FAST IT'S GOING TO GO

20101207193838.143|20101207193839.571|CCO|HAVE BEEN STRUGGLING WITH THAT 
20101207193839.571|20101207193841.000|CCO|QUESTION.
20101207193841.000|20101207193843.000|CCO|SO I'M NOT GOING TO MAKE A 
20101207193843.000|20101207193845.000|CCO|PREDICTION.
20101207193845.000|20101207193847.000|CCO|WHAT I CAN SAY WITH CONFIDENCE 
20101207193847.000|20101207193849.000|CCO|IS THAT THIS PACKAGE WILL HELP 
20101207193849.000|20101207193851.000|CCO|STRENGTHEN THE ECONOMY -- WILL 
20101207193851.000|20101207193852.429|CCO|HELP STRENGTHEN THE RECOVERY.
20101207193852.429|20101207193853.857|CCO|THAT I'M CONFIDENT ABOUT.
20101207193853.857|20101207193855.286|CCO|CHUCK TODD.
20101207193855.286|20101207193856.714|CCO|>> MR. PRESIDENT, WHAT DO YOU 
20101207193856.714|20101207193858.143|CCO|SAY TO DEMOCRATS WHO SAY YOU'RE 
20101207193858.143|20101207193859.571|CCO|REWARDING REPUBLICAN OBSTRUCTION
20101207193859.571|20101207193901.000|CCO|HERE?
20101207193901.000|20101207193902.429|CCO|YOU YOURSELF USED IN THE OPENING
20101207193902.429|20101207193903.857|CCO|STATEMENT THEY WERE UNWILLING TO
20101207193903.857|20101207193905.286|CCO|BUDGE ON THIS.
20101207193905.286|20101207193906.714|CCO|A LOT OF PROGRESSIVE DEMOCRATS 
20101207193906.714|20101207193908.143|CCO|ARE SAYING THEY'RE UNWILLING TO 
20101207193908.143|20101207193909.571|CCO|BUDGE.
20101207193909.571|20101207193911.000|CCO|AND YOU'RE ASKING THEM TO GET 
20101207193911.000|20101207193912.667|CCO|OFF THE FENCE AND BUDGE.
20101207193912.667|20101207193914.333|CCO|WHY SHOULD THEY BE REWARDING 
20101207193914.333|20101207193916.000|CCO|REPUBLICAN OBSTRUCTIONISTS?
20101207193916.000|20101207193917.667|CCO|>> LET ME USE A COUPLE OF 
20101207193917.667|20101207193919.333|CCO|ANALOGIES.
20101207193919.333|20101207193921.000|CCO|I'VE SAID BEFORE THAT I FELT 
20101207193921.000|20101207193923.500|CCO|THAT THE MIDDLE CLASS TAX CUTS 
20101207193923.500|20101207193926.000|CCO|WERE BEING HELD HOSTAGE TO THE 
20101207193926.000|20101207193928.500|CCO|HIGH END TAX CUTS.
20101207193928.500|20101207193931.000|CCO|I THINK IT'S TEMPTING NOT TO 
20101207193931.000|20101207193933.500|CCO|NEGOTIATE WITH HOSTAGE-TAKERS.
20101207193933.500|20101207193936.000|CCO|UNLESS THE HOSTAGE GETS HARMED.
20101207193936.000|20101207193938.500|CCO|THEN PEOPLE WILL QUESTION THE 
20101207193938.500|20101207193941.000|CCO|WISDOM OF THAT STRATEGY.
20101207193941.000|20101207193942.667|CCO|IN THIS CASE, THE HOSTAGE WAS 
20101207193942.667|20101207193944.333|CCO|THE AMERICAN PEOPLE AND I WAS 
20101207193944.333|20101207193946.000|CCO|NOT WILLING TO SEE THEM GET 
20101207193946.000|20101207193947.667|CCO|HARMED.
20101207193947.667|20101207193949.333|CCO|AGAIN, THIS IS NOT AN ABSTRACT 
20101207193949.333|20101207193951.000|CCO|POLITICAL FIGHT.
20101207193951.000|20101207193952.429|CCO|THIS IS NOT ISOLATED HERE IN 
20101207193952.429|20101207193953.857|CCO|WASHINGTON.
20101207193953.857|20101207193955.286|CCO|THERE ARE PEOPLE RIGHT NOW WHO 
20101207193955.286|20101207193956.714|CCO|WHEN THEIR UNEMPLOYMENT 
20101207193956.714|20101207193958.143|CCO|INSURANCE RUNS OUT WILL NOT BE 
20101207193958.143|20101207193959.571|CCO|ABLE TO PAY THE BILLS.
20101207193959.571|20101207194001.000|CCO|THERE ARE FOLKS RIGHT NOW WHO 
20101207194001.000|20101207194003.000|CCO|ARE JUST BARELY MAKING IT ON THE
20101207194003.000|20101207194005.000|CCO|PAYCHECK THAT THEY'VE GOT.
20101207194005.000|20101207194007.000|CCO|AND WHEN THAT PAYCHECK GETS 
20101207194007.000|20101207194009.000|CCO|SMALLER ON JANUARY 1st, THEY'RE 
20101207194009.000|20101207194011.000|CCO|GOING TO HAVE TO SCRAMBLE TO 
20101207194011.000|20101207194012.667|CCO|FIGURE OUT HOW AM I GOING TO PAY
20101207194012.667|20101207194014.333|CCO|ALL MY BILLS?
20101207194014.333|20101207194016.000|CCO|HOW AM I GNG TO KEEP ON MAKING
20101207194016.000|20101207194017.667|CCO|THE PAYMENTS FOR MY CHILD'S 
20101207194017.667|20101207194019.333|CCO|COLLEGE TUITION?
20101207194019.333|20101207194021.000|CCO|WHAT AM I GOING TO DO EXACTLY?

20101207194023.000|20101207194025.000|CCO|BATTLE WITH THE REPUBLICANS OVER

20101207194027.000|20101207194029.000|CCO|AS I SAID, THE AMERICAN PEOPLE

20101207194038.143|20101207194039.571|CCO|THE POLLS ARE ON OUR SIDE ON 
20101207194039.571|20101207194041.000|CCO|THIS.
20101207194041.000|20101207194042.667|CCO|WE WEREN'T OPERATING FROM A 
20101207194042.667|20101207194044.333|CCO|POSITION OF POLITICAL WEAKNESS

20101207194047.667|20101207194049.333|CCO|FEEL THAT THIS IS THE SINGLE

20101207194051.000|20101207194056.000|CCO|HAVE TO FIGHT FOR AS A PARTY.

20101207194105.000|20101207194107.000|CCO|POSITION NEXT YEAR THAN THEY DO

20101207194109.000|20101207194111.000|CCO|SO I GUESS ANOTHER WAY OF

20101207194127.000|20101207194129.000|CCO|PEOPLE NEED RIGHT NOW, THAT 
20101207194129.000|20101207194131.000|CCO|WOULD HAVE BEEN UNACCEPTABLE.

20101207194134.333|20101207194137.667|CCO|YOU WOULD BE LOOKING AT $700

20101207194141.000|20101207194143.500|CCO|THE DEFICIT WITH VERY LITTLE ON

20101207194146.000|20101207194148.500|CCO|TO OFFSET THAT.
20101207194148.500|20101207194151.000|CCO|THE DEAL THAT WE'VE STRUCK HERE

20101207194155.000|20101207194157.000|CCO|AND THAT GIVES US THE TIME TO

20101207194201.000|20101207194202.667|CCO|CASUALTIES FOR THE AMERICAN

20101207194221.000|20101207194223.000|CCO|FORCE YOU TO CAPITULATE?
20101207194223.000|20101207194225.000|CCO|>> I DON'T THINK SO.
20101207194225.000|20101207194227.000|CCO|AND THE REASON IS BECAUSE THIS 
20101207194227.000|20101207194229.000|CCO|IS A VERY UNIQUE CIRCUMSTANCE.
20101207194229.000|20101207194231.000|CCO|THIS IS A SITUATION IN WHICH 
20101207194231.000|20101207194234.333|CCO|TENS OF MILLIONS OF PEOPLE WOULD
20101207194234.333|20101207194237.667|CCO|BE DIRECTLY DAMAGED AND

20101207194246.000|20101207194247.667|CCO|THROUGH TWO YEARS, CHUCK, WHERE 
20101207194247.667|20101207194249.333|CCO|THE RAP ON ME WAS I WAS TOO 
20101207194249.333|20101207194251.000|CCO|STUBBORN AND WASN'T WILLING TO 
20101207194251.000|20101207194252.667|CCO|BUDGE ON A WHOLE BUNCH OF ISSUES

20101207194254.333|20101207194256.000|CCO|CARE WHERE EVERYBODY HERE WAS

20101207194259.333|20101207194301.000|CCO|DESPITE THAT, SOMEHOW THE GUY IS
20101207194301.000|20101207194302.667|CCO|GOING TO BULLDOZE HIS WAY

20101207194304.333|20101207194306.000|CCO|>> THEY'RE NOT HAPPY WITH IT.
20101207194306.000|20101207194307.667|CCO|>> BUT THAT'S MY POINT.
20101207194307.667|20101207194309.333|CCO|MY POINT IS I DON'T MAKE 
20101207194309.333|20101207194311.000|CCO|JUDGMENTS BASED ON WHAT THE 
20101207194311.000|20101207194312.667|CCO|CONVENTIONAL WISDOM IS AT ANY 
20101207194312.667|20101207194314.333|CCO|GIVEN TIME.
20101207194314.333|20101207194316.000|CCO|I MAKE MY JUDGMENTS BASED ON 
20101207194316.000|20101207194317.667|CCO|WHAT I THINK IS RIGHT FOR THE 
20101207194317.667|20101207194319.333|CCO|COUNTRY AND FOR THE AMERICAN 
20101207194319.333|20101207194321.000|CCO|PEOPLE RIGHT NOW.
20101207194321.000|20101207194323.500|CCO|AND I WILL BE HAPPY TO SEE THE 
20101207194323.500|20101207194326.000|CCO|REPUBLICANS TEST WHETHER OR NOT 
20101207194326.000|20101207194328.500|CCO|I'M ITCHING FOR A FIGHT ON A 
20101207194328.500|20101207194331.000|CCO|WHOLE RANGE OF ISSUES.
20101207194331.000|20101207194332.667|CCO|I SUSPECT THEY WILL FINDS I AM.
20101207194332.667|20101207194334.333|CCO|AND I THINK THE AMERICAN PEOPLE 
20101207194334.333|20101207194336.000|CCO|WILL BE ON MY SIDE ON A WHOLE 
20101207194336.000|20101207194337.667|CCO|BUNCH OF THESE FIGHTS.
20101207194337.667|20101207194339.333|CCO|BUT RIGHT NOW, I WANT TO MAKE 
20101207194339.333|20101207194341.000|CCO|SURE THAT THE AMERICAN PEOPLE 
20101207194341.000|20101207194342.667|CCO|AREN'T HURT BECAUSE WE'RE HAVING

20101207194344.333|20101207194346.000|CCO|AND I THINK THAT THIS AGREEMENT 
20101207194346.000|20101207194347.667|CCO|ACCOMPLISHES THAT.
20101207194347.667|20101207194349.333|CCO|AND AS I SAID, THERE ARE A WHOLE
20101207194349.333|20101207194351.000|CCO|BUNCH OF THINGS THAT THERE ARE 
20101207194351.000|20101207194353.000|CCO|GIVING UP.
20101207194353.000|20101207194355.000|CCO|THE TRUTH OF THE MATTER IS FROM 
20101207194355.000|20101207194357.000|CCO|THE REPUBLICAN PERSPECTIVE THE 
20101207194357.000|20101207194359.000|CCO|EARNED INCOME TAX CREDIT, THE 
20101207194359.000|20101207194401.000|CCO|COLLEGE TUITION TAX CREDIT, THE 
20101207194401.000|20101207194403.500|CCO|CHILD TAX CREDIT, ALL THOSE
